text: Karsten Stehen Sørensen (born February 1, 1948) is a former Danish handball player who competed in the 1972 Summer Olympics.Sports-Reference profile He played his club handball with Aarhus KFUM. In 1972 he was part of the Denmark national handball team which finished thirteenth in the 1972 Olympic tournament. He played two matches and scored five goals. ==References== Category:1948 births Category:Living people Category:Danish male handball players Category:Olympic handball players of Denmark Category:Handball players at the 1972 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Aarhus
title: Karsten Sørensen
